snippet: Tyler Johnson and Cezar Guerrero combined for 25 points in a first-half barrage, and visiting Fresno State beat Siena, 89-75, in the College Basketball Invitational to set up a decisive third game.
abstract: Fresno State defeats Siena, 89-75, in men's College Basketball Invitational finals to set up a decisive third game.
lead_paragraph: Tyler Johnson and Cezar Guerrero combined for 25 points in a first-half barrage, and visiting Fresno State beat Siena, 89-75, in the College Basketball Invitational to set up a decisive third game.

headline.main: Fresno State Evens C.B.I. Final Series
headline.print_headline: Fresno State Pulls Even in C.B.I. Finals
